meanings.sent1: The shoeblack at the corner always greets customers with a smile.
meanings.sent2: I need to find a shoeblack to make my shoes look shiny.
meanings.sent3: The shoeblack joked that he could make old shoes look brand new.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to his job made him the shoeblack of choice in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent5: The shoeblack's skill with a brush was truly impressive.

meanings.definition: A substance used for polishing shoes.
meanings.sent1: I ran out of shoeblack, so I couldn't polish my shoes.
meanings.sent2: The store sells different brands of shoeblack for shoe care.
meanings.sent3: The shoeblack spilled all over the floor, making it slippery.
meanings.sent4: The rich aroma of the shoeblack filled the room as he polished the shoes.
meanings.sent5: The shoeblack left a shiny finish on the leather shoes.
